page.title: 02Clothes
page.content: Birdwatching is one of my hobbies.I wear waterproof trousers and coat, and wellington boots.I wear that if I go birdwatching near water.I would not use the waterproof trousers if I was going into a wood. For school I wear underwear, shirt, trousers, jumper, shoes and a light coat.In winter I wear the same,only with a heavy coat and wellies.For swimming I wear trunks and maybe goggles. Here is a list of what I am wearing and what it is made of:- Jumper....50%cotton,50%acrylic. Shirt.....35%cotton,65%polyester. Tee-shirt.50%cotton,50%acrylic. Trousers..35%cotton,65%polyester. By David Boyce aged 11.
